title: How can future technology be beneficial to the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sometimes we see the world in a very monochrome, binary way,” says Williams, a historian, scientific adviser and futurologist. “For instance, technology is seen as good. But advanced, sentient machines that can feel, think and mimic human behaviour and thus one day rise up and take control of society is bad. How on earth do we reach such conclusions? Because we fear change. We’re naturally suspicious of advances, especially in science. We like our rules, regulations and order. We don’t relish disruption. Yet science has always disrupted society and society has always adapted. And let’s not forget, it has always advanced, too. Certainly, we’re in the midst of one of the most exciting periods of scientific change that the human race has ever experienced, yet it’s not something we should fear.”

Human Being. Thats the technology thats been evolving and is most beneficial to the world (Of course, from human being’s perspective). It will continue to be so. With the efforts being put in understand the nature and influence of energy sphere on a human body, mind and health, I hope it will lead us to healthy future for us, filled with in-living with nature. Soul dancing to the tunes of branches of the trees, rivers flowing with crystalline water, animals allowed their freedom in deep forests. Lesser explosives, fuller smiles. We should realise ourselves as human beings first, rather than citizen of a country, a religion, a caste, colour, etc. We are the one of the best technology. We still don't understand ourselves completely. Ask a top scientist how a brain works, why does our behaviour change with exposure to certain kinds of energy fields - no one has a confident answer. So, the answer is Human Being.
